website_summaries.verdict: A good overall truck tire meant for lighter vehicles, such as midsize pickups and SUVs.
pros: Tire design maximizes highway performance while decreasing rolling resistance at highway speeds
Tire size matches most factory tires, making it a great replacement or spare
cons: Sidewalls tend to separate after a while

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They're a little noisy, but nothing that's unbearable. C'mon, they're 20's. Grip is pretty great, wet or dry. Not sports-car level, but on a 2011 Explorer Limited, that's not what I was expecting. I've put 3k on them so far, and I'd have no problems buying them again. Edit - one year, and almost 28k miles on them, they're still as noisy, but holding up extremely well. Cornering is still great, wet traction is still great. I'd still have no problems buying another set if and when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Topher B

customer_reviews.title: They must have changed the tires
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 2012 Ford Explorer Limited. They must have changed the tires since all the 'noisy' feedback*, I ended up checking other online resources and did not see the same sort of comments being left. I find them to be slightly louder than the Hankook tires they replaced, at little growl when braking and a little more thump when hitting buckles in the concrete at highway speed. A very minimal difference making them well worth the saving over putting Hankook tires back on. They performed very well during a heavy rain recently, better than the Hankook tires. *I think Hankook dealers are leaving all of the "they're noisy" comments. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Gray Beard

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the price. The tires have a date on them that was only a few months old. I was stoked to have new tires for this price. I buy tires for my vehicles all the time on Amazon cause of the ease and price. These are great looking and do good in all road conditions, but they are loud. Really loud. Made me think I had a wheel bearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Not Michelin but good ride and ok handling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a used 2011 Ford Edge that had four of these tires. Three were like new and the fourth had more wear and a lot of weather checking. I replaced the bad one with this identical tire. The ride is good and the handling OK for a cheaper tire. I'm still switching to Michelin when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Todd in AZ

customer_reviews.title: A nosy tire
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be a good tire, I have about 4,000 miles, only complaint very noisy at low speed & when coming to a stop. wear seems good, can't really tell yet though, have them on a 2011 Ford Explorer Limited.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for the price. I put these on a 2013 Explorer Limited. They drive and handle great in the dry or rain. Thread wear has been fine also. Nexen makes a good product.
customer_reviews.author: skill7545

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tires on March 22, 2018. Every single one of them is sitting at 3/32 tread depth and have to be replaced. Probably 30K miles out of them. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: The price is great. Excellent value. They ride very well. Balanced with minimal weight. Good handling. Very good in the rain....no snow yet but we will see!
customer_reviews.author: bmf143

customer_reviews.title: These are garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Wet traction is horrible.Road noise is awful..overall tire stinks..didn't last a full year before I got rid of them..would not recommended to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Nice ride. Quiet ride. Awesome traction in rain an snow
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hildenbrand ASE Ford Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: So far fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Only have probably 1,000 miles on them.....so far they are quiet, handle well, and shed water well on a Ford Explorer Limited
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NEXEN Roadian Tire
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. No complaints after the first 1000 miles.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Way cheaper than any place i found in my area. Great tires so far! No issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: they not a good product. I've to buy 2 more tires before ...
customer_reviews.text: they not a good product. I've to buy 2 more tires before I change all of them. I want to know if I don't have warranty .please let me know thans.
customer_reviews.author: Dorenoncourt Poteau

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, as promised
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, as promised. Miffed as to why 3 were delivered, then 2 days later 4th came. Had to delay install. Good looking, great riding tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: are awesome. I'm not sure why everyone else is saying ...
customer_reviews.text: These tires, so far, are awesome. I'm not sure why everyone else is saying they're loud. Driven them slow, driven them fast and no road noise what do ever. These are XL tires meaning extra load whichis a good thing for packing the car full of stuff. You can't beat the price either! Only complaint isn't on the manufacturer, they're directional tires so the only rotation is rear to front. They look good on the Explorer Ltd!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: For the price it was a great deal. They work great
customer_reviews.author: Robert and Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tires for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price but sound like all terrain mud tires. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chris N Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Found these tires as good as other main top branda
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Roughest riding, Noisiest tire I have ever encountered!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing about this tire that I like, they have more noise than my mudders on my truck, sounds like driving a cement truck when stopping. Rough riding and loud, did I say loud? Worse tire I’ve ever experienced and I used to have an automotive tire shop, so believe me I know. Nexen should recall all of them and melt them down, terrible tire, Do Not Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan McBride

product_meta.title: Nexen Roadian HP All- Season Radial Tire-255/50R20 109V
product_meta.description: For enhanced high performance grip on any road surface, the Nexen Roadian HP is the right choice. Its large shoulder block maximizes cornering grip and stability, while the arrow-type center rib improves handling. Pattern noise is reduced by a 5 random pitch variation. When wet conditions hit, wide deep grooves provide excellent drainage, braking and anti-hydroplaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
